languages.text: First successful Shield Block per round grants wielder +2 AP on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: First successful Shield Block per round grants wielder +2 AP on their next turn.

languages.text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокирует{/g} атаку с помощью щита, в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} он получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer successfully blocks an attack with a shield for the first time in a round, they gain +2 AP on their next turn.

Whenever the wearer successfully blocks an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer successfully blocks an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer successfully blocks an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir saldırıyı başarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blokladığında{/g} bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, bir rauntta ilk kez bir saldırıyı başarıyla blokladığında bir sonraki turunda +2 EP kazanır.
Giyen kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir saldırıyı başarıyla blokladığında bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} +2 EP kazanır.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquea{/g} con éxito un ataque usando un escudo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} para su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador bloquea con éxito un ataque usando un escudo por primera vez en un asalto, gana +2 PA para su próximo turno.

Cada vez que el portador bloquea con éxito un ataque usando un escudo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} para su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次使用盾牌{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}攻击时，装备者在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者每轮中首次使用盾牌格挡攻击时，装备者在下个回合额外获得2点行动点数。
当装备者每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次使用盾牌格挡攻击时，装备者在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen Angriff erfolgreich mit einem Schild {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blockt{/g}, erhält er bei seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer Runde einen Angriff erfolgreich mit einem Schild blockt, erhält er bei seinem nächsten Zug +2 AP.

Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen Angriff erfolgreich mit einem Schild blockt, erhält er bei seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen Angriff erfolgreich mit einem Schild blockt, erhält er bei seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloque{/g} pour la première fois une attaque avec son bouclier au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il gagne +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} pour son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur bloque pour la première fois une attaque avec son bouclier au cours d'un round, il gagne +2 PA pour son prochain tour.

Chaque fois que le porteur bloque pour la première fois une attaque avec son bouclier au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il gagne +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} pour son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてシールドで攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}すると、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+2される。

traits.locale_text: 使用者がラウンドで初めてシールドで攻撃をブロックすると、次のターンにAPが+2される。

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж впервые за раунд блокирует атаку с помощью щита, в свой следующий ход он получает +2 ОД.
